questions.text: What brings you to G-Star today?
How often do you shop with us?

inspiration.subject_line: Reignite Your Style Journey with G-Star
inspiration.preheader: Remember when you first discovered G-Star? Let's rediscover that passion together.
inspiration.hero_image_description: A bold, urban streetwear look featuring G-Star's latest collection, showcasing confidence and individuality.
inspiration.first_paragraph: We noticed you haven't been exploring your style with us lately. At G-Star, we believe in pushing boundaries and expressing your unique self. Let's reignite that spark and help you create looks that turn heads.

first.template: You've already created {{customer.highest_value_achieved}} stunning looks with us.
first.fallback: You've already created some stunning looks with us.

second.template: With our latest collection, you could save up to {{customer.potential_savings}} on your next purchase.
second.fallback: With our latest collection, you could save big on your next purchase.

nostalgia.preheader: From your first purchase to now, let's keep making style history together.
nostalgia.hero_image_description: A nostalgic collage of G-Star's iconic designs over the years, highlighting timeless style.
nostalgia.first_paragraph: We've shared some incredible style moments together. From your first G-Star purchase to your latest favorite piece, your journey with us has been unforgettable. Let's keep creating those timeless looks.

first.template: You've been a valued part of the G-Star family for {{customer.relationship_value}} years.
first.fallback: You've been a valued part of the G-Star family for years.

second.template: Your loyalty has earned you {{customer.lifetime_value}} in exclusive benefits.
second.fallback: Your loyalty has earned you exclusive benefits.

social_proof.preheader: Your style is missed in our vibrant community. Let's reconnect and inspire together.
social_proof.hero_image_description: A lively scene of G-Star enthusiasts showcasing their unique styles at a community event.
social_proof.first_paragraph: The G-Star community is buzzing with creativity, and your unique style is a big part of that. Let's reconnect and continue to inspire each other with bold, innovative looks.

first.template: You're ranked {{customer.community_rank}} in our community for your stunning style.
first.fallback: You're a top influencer in our community for your stunning style.

second.template: Your engagement score of {{customer.engagement_score}} shows how much you're loved here.
second.fallback: Your engagement shows how much you're loved here.
